author: sproul
content:
<@654267572107083777> Does Nimbus encode the `execution_payload_blinded` field in block v3 responses as a _string_?

A user running Lighthouse VC with Nimbus BN just failed a block proposal with this decoding error, where it looks like Lighthouse was expecting a bool but received a string `"true"`:

> info: block v3 proposal failed, this error may or may not result in a missed block, block_slot: Slot(XXX), error: "Error from beacon node when producing block: Recoverable(\"Error from beacon node when producing block: HttpClient(, kind: decode, detail: invalid type: string \\\"true\\\", expected a boolean)\")", service: block

author: nflaig
content: I think it does, see https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/issues/6636#issuecomment-2039946095 with ref to Nimbus source code
